Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 36th Pl./California
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 36th Pl., California, 38th, Kedzie and 36th Pl.: due to, street blockage near 36th Pl./California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 36th Pl., California, 38th, Kedzie and 36th Pl.: due to, street blockage near 36th Pl./California.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
